column4: I don't think you can use zip in a pipe, so you have to untar the file and zip it afterwards. Most archivers for Windows, e.g. WinZip, can handle tar files, though.
I have to send this zip into a bot on a server ... you think the zip decoder can handle tars?  I'll have to try
well, in that case it's rather unlikely.
I'll try and let you know.  It's just a dumb bot.
